alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:04AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN FAIRFIELD AND CENTRAL WESTCHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM EDT... At 1204 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenwich, or over Port Chester, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Norwalk, Port Chester, New Canaan, Greenwich, Westport, Darien, and Rye Brook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
